SELECT SEQ_BOARD_PK.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BOARD (ID , SUBJECT , CONTENT , EMAIL , CRT_DT , MDFY_DT) VALUES (#{id} , #{subject} , #{content} , #{email} , SYSDATE , SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT LEVEL-1 DEPTH , B.ID , B.SUBJECT , B.CONTENT , B.EMAIL , TO_CHAR(B.CRT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') CRT_DT , TO_CHAR(B.MDFY_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') MDFY_DT , M.NAME , R.REPLY , R.REPLY_ID , R.PRNT_REPLY_ID , TO_CHAR(R.CRT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') RPL_CRT_DT , TO_CHAR(R.MDFY_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') RPL_MDFY_DT , RM.NAME R_NAME , RM.EMAIL R_EMAIL FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE ID = #{_parameter}) B JOIN MEMBERS M ON M.EMAIL = B.EMAIL LEFT JOIN REPLIES R ON R.BOARD_ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN MEMBERS RM ON RM.EMAIL = R.EMAIL START WITH R.PRNT_REPLY_ID = 0 OR R.PRNT_REPLY_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR R.REPLY_ID = R.PRNT_REPLY_ID

SELECT B.ID , B.SUBJECT , B.CONTENT , B.EMAIL , TO_CHAR(B.CRT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') CRT_DT , TO_CHAR(B.MDFY_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') MDFY_DT , M.NAME , R.REPLY , TO_CHAR(R.CRT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') RPL_CRT_DT , TO_CHAR(R.MDFY_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') RPL_MDFY_DT , RM.NAME R_NAME , RM.EMAIL R_EMAIL FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBERS M ON M.EMAIL = B.EMAIL LEFT JOIN REPLIES R ON R.BOARD_ID = B.ID LEFT JOIN MEMBERS RM ON RM.EMAIL = R.EMAIL ORDER BY MDFY_DT DESC
SELECT ID , SUBJECT , CONTENT , TO_CHAR(CRT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') CRT_DT , TO_CHAR(MDFY_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') MDFY_DT FROM BOARD WHERE EMAIL = #{_parameter}
